subheading: MEW helps you to generate Vapory wallets, and interact with the Vapory blockchain easily and securely. MEW is a free and open-source, client-side interface.
obtainAddress: To obtain VAP address and generate your private key. Saving and safekeeping the key will be your responsibility.
accessMyWalletDesc: To send Vapory and tokens, swap coins, sale the domain, deploy the contract after you access your wallet.
aboutSubheading: MyVaporWallet - please, call us MEW - puts the Vapory blockchain at your fingertips. We are a team of crypto enthusiasts dedicated to bring you the most secure, most intuitive, and dare we say prettiest way to manage your VAP and ERC-20 tokens. We're always here to help, and we're never giving away VAP. Cheers!
aboutBeResponsible: Please Take Responsible For Your Account Security.
